This close approach, while posing no threat, underscores the critical importance of continuous monitoring of near-Earth objects by international agencies like NASA and ISRO for planetary defense and scientific research.

title: FCV tobacco prices surge on export boom, farmers reap record gains

title: Gold prices hit new high! US reserves cross $1tn in value; over 90 times fixed value
description: The US Treasury's gold reserves now exceed $1 trillion at market prices, vastly surpassing their official $11 billion valuation. Record gold prices, driven by market volatility, have created this potential $990 billion windfall, which could address half the budget deficit. However, revaluing these reserves is not being seriously considered due to financial system concerns.

title: 'Gold rush' for India? Trump's H-1B move falls flat; US may lose high-value jobs
description: Donald Trump's H-1B visa fee increase to $100,000, intended to safeguard US jobs, is reportedly backfiring. US companies are now accelerating the shift of high-value work, including AI and product development, to India's booming Global Capability Centers. This move could turbocharge India's rise as a global innovation hub, despite potential future tax hurdles.

title: Raipur shaken by lodge murder: Pregnant teen stabs boyfriend to death, flees
description: A shocking murder has emerged in Raipur, where a 16-year-old girl allegedly fatally stabbed her 20-year-old engineering student boyfriend, Mohammed Saddam, inside a lodge. Police discovered Saddam's body with multiple stab wounds after the girl was seen leaving alone. She later confessed, claiming pregnancy and self-defense after he allegedly threatened her during a heated dispute over marriage.

description: Chennai police arrested YouTuber Felix Gerald for questioning over videos he published about the Karur stampede, which claimed 41 lives. This detention is part of a broader police crackdown on misinformation surrounding the incident, following earlier arrests of three individuals for spreading rumors. Authorities are monitoring online platforms and warn of strict legal action against those circulating false narratives.

UP man held for murdering wife, mom, father to claim Rs 50 crore insurance
description: A man was arrested in Hapur for allegedly murdering his first wife, father, and mother. He sought Rs 50 crore in insurance claims. His fourth wife alerted police about suspicious deaths. The accused had already received Rs 1.5 crore. Police are investigating a wider multi-state insurance scam. The father had 64 policies worth Rs 50 crore.

title: ‘I Love Muhammad’ row: 38 shops on ‘waqf land’ vacated by Bareilly admin
description: Bareilly authorities sealed 38 shops, predominantly minority-owned, citing encroachment days after a clash between protesters and police. Shop owners allege this action is a reprisal for Friday's unrest, while the district magistrate stated it's part of a crackdown on rioters. The IMC chief, linked to the shops, was arrested earlier.

title: 22,000 tech layoffs: Accenture, Microsoft hit; 5 career moves to make
description: In 2025, over 22,000 tech jobs were cut at major firms including Accenture, Microsoft, Intel, and Salesforce. AI adoption, efficiency drives, and shifting skill demands are reshaping the industry. Workers must adapt by reskilling strategically, focusing on roles that complement automation, and preparing for ongoing volatility. The future rewards adaptability, not tenure, in an AI-driven economy.

title: Demis Hassabis to grads: 4 ways to get ahead; thrive in the AI age
description: Google DeepMind CEO Demis Hassabis outlines four ways graduates can thrive in the age of artificial intelligence: mastering AGI tools, building a strong STEM foundation, developing prompt engineering and fine-tuning skills, and adopting a lifelong learning mindset. His advice stresses that future leaders will be those who are “native” with AI systems and able to shape their evolution.

title: MP woman dies while dancing with husband at Garba event
description: A 19-year-old woman, Sonam Yadav, tragically died while dancing with her husband at a Garba pandal in Khargone, Madhya Pradesh. She suddenly fainted and was declared dead at the hospital. The incident, captured on a viral video, occurred without police being formally informed, and her last rites were performed without a post-mortem.

title: Trump threatens to withhold funds from NYC if it elects Zohran Mamdani as Mayor
Techie in shorts assaulted at govt co-working space in Chennai over ‘dress code’
description: Assistant engineer Vijayakumar said they had to bring in some guys to throw the people out as they kept arguing.

title: Nvidia CEO on H-1B visa fees hike: Great start, but $100,000 fees is...
description: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang has backed President Trump's H-1B visa program overhaul, hailing it as a "great start" to address system abuse. However, Huang warned that the new $100,000 application fee is prohibitively expensive, risking the deterrence of foreign talent and driving tech investment away from the US. He emphasized that attracting global talent is crucial for America's future, cautioning the high cost could disadvantage startups and impact international talent flows, while also addressing concerns about Chinese researchers.

title: Accenture layoffs: CEO says ‘we are exiting" employees we can't retrain
description: Accenture has reportedly laid off thousands of employees this year, citing their inability to be retrained in AI skills, as it reshapes its workforce for the AI era. The company is simultaneously expanding its AI capabilities and plans to increase headcount, reflecting a broader industry trend of adapting to AI or facing obsolescence.

title: Gabrielle Union reveals her biggest fear after Dwyane Wade’s cancer diagnosis
description: Gabrielle Union revealed her biggest fear when Dwyane Wade was diagnosed with kidney cancer, admitting she worried about raising their children alone. His secrecy regarding his health decisions caused distrust, nearly bringing their marriage to rock bottom. Wade underwent surgery in December 2023 to remove 40% of his right kidney.
